articles.title: Self-defense against COVID-19? Elderly man faces arrest after shove in elevator...
articles.description:
Self-defense against COVID-19? Elderly man faces arrest after shove in elevator...

 
 
 
 (Second column, 7th story, link)

 

 

 
 Related stories:At least 80 Washington students in fraternities test positive, foreboding sign for college reopenings...…

Hospitalizations cause for concern...

 Related stories:PEAK VIRUS: USA reports 55,000 cases in single day...
Rising in 40 states...
JULY 4TH SUPER SPREAD?
FAUCI: 'Way beyond worst spike'...

articles.title: OmmWriter 1.64 - A simple text editor for writers. (Commercial)
articles.description: OmmWriter is a simple text editor for writers. Ommwriter is a simple text processor that firmly believes in making writing a pleasure once again, vindicating the close relationship between writer and paper. The more intimate the relation, the smoother the flo…

articles.title: iBoostUp 8.1.2 - Optimize your Mac, fix performance and errors. (Free)
articles.description: iBoostUp is a system optimizer that monitors and corrects system performance problems. It tunes up and optimizes your Mac by purging unneeded files, fixing your hard disk, giving you performance recommendations, protecting your privacy by removing cookies, di…

articles.title: Timing 2020.7 - Discover how you spend time on your Mac. (Shareware)
articles.description: Timing is the best way to keep track of the time you spend with your Mac. Find out where your time goes - without ever having to start a timer again! Timing automatically tracks which documents you are editing, which applications you use, and the domains of t…

articles.author: Stephen Searer
articles.title: Rossmann Romania Offices – Bucharest
articles.description:
Mobexpert Office has achieved the office design for Rossmann Romania, a cardboard packaging production company,...
The post Rossmann Romania Offices – Bucharest appeared first on Office Snapshots.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain OVA - Episode 28 - Gunshot of Remorse
articles.description: Unable to let go of his anger, Quent refuses to stay with the group any longer and attempts to leave. But when a familiar light gleams through the sky, they encounter Darcia once again. Is this the final point of their journey?

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 21 - The Weight of the Sea
articles.description: G-IT Corps commander Kia Mbeki attempts to incinerate the G-Self using a giant Mobile Armor, the Conque de Venus. However, to resolve the crisis in the artificial sea in space, the Ocean Ring, he embarks on a desperate plan.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 20 - Space Inside a Frame
articles.description: Escaping from the hijacked transport ship, the Megafauna heads to meet the ruler of Venus Globe, La Gu. Bellri manages to take back the G-Self but wanders into a space inside a frame while being chased by the G-IT Corps.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 19 - The Venus Globe Gang
articles.description: Bellri and company, having hitched a ride aboard a transport ship bound for the space colony near Venus, the Venus Globe, find themselves busy running a marathon and doing routine checks and maintenance on their machines. As all this is happening, a group cal…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 18 - Ride the Crescent Moon
articles.description: Mask boards the Megafauna in an attempt to seize the G-Self and new Mobile Suits launch from Towasanga with their sights set on the G-Self as well. While Bellri acts as a decoy, the Megafauna attempts to flee to a Photon Battery transport ship.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 17 - Aida's Decision
articles.description: When there is a break in Towasanga's outer wall, the Megafauna crew help with collecting space debris. Aida suggests hiding behind a Meteor Balloon to escape from Towasanga. Meanwhile, the Mask Corps launches to test the Mobile Suit Bifron.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 14 - Space and Mobile Suit Battles
articles.description: A conference is held between General Dorette who has come from the moon and the people of Earth represented by Gusion. However, immediately following the conference, Mask and Klim carry out a Mobile Suit battle using Sankt Porto as a shield. Bellri is enraged…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 9 - The Megafauna Heads South
articles.description: Having heard about the threat from space from Gusion, Bellri proposes that the Megafauna head to the Capital Territory to find out the truth. Mask, having gained a new subordinate, Barara, discovers the Megafauna at the Izanellian Continent's table mountains.…

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 12 - Ken
articles.description: Kaneki and Hide are reunited, and the two of them revisit the times they spent together. Kaneki and Touka separately remember the other members of Anteiku, as both they and CCG cope with their losses.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 11 - Deluge of Flowers
articles.description: Suzuya is left to face the newly-arrived one-eyed Owl on his own. Aogiri Tree joins the battle against CCG, who find themselves overwhelmed by the sheer number of opponents. Meanwhile, Kaneki confronts Amon, who stands in his way to Anteiku.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 7 - Permeation
articles.description: Tsukiyama shows up at Anteiku with news for Yoshimura about Kaneki's attempt to become a kakuja via serial ghoul cannibalism. Concerned over her "Big Brother," Hinami accompanies Tsukiyama to a coffee shop, where she again runs into Takatsuki.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 1 - New Surge
articles.description: As Shinohara and Kuroiwa prepare to take on the Owl, Amon insists on joining the battle. Ayato attacks Touka, and Kaneki comes to her rescue. Meanwhile, Yomo, Tsukiyama, and Uta take on Noro, but find him to be a most unexpected opponent.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 6 - Keeper
articles.description: Shiro gathers SCEPTER 4 and HOMRA to inform them about the Green King's past and his ambition to release the Dresden Slates' power to the world. Realizing that war is inevitable, the three clans prepare themselves for the coming battle against the Green Clan.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 4 - Knot
K - Return of Kings - Episode 2 - Kindness
articles.description: Blue King Reisi Munakata summons Kuro to SCEPTER 4 to learn more about his recent encounter with JUNGLE, while Neko waits for her partner at HOMRA's home base. Meanwhile, Awashima notices that Munakata's Sword of Damocles is beginning to reach its limit.

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 8 - Two is a Treasure
articles.description: Liz returns to Demon World Acropolis and discovers that the Acropolis Police are after Braz. Meanwhile, Staz finds the man who kidnapped Fuyumi, only to let him escape after Bell purposefully gets in his way.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 26 - Moonlight Crucible
articles.description: Darcia faces Jaguara while the pack works to break free. Cheza’s sad song fills their ears as she beings to wither. Time is running out—will Paradise be for the humans or the wolves?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 16 - Dream Journey
articles.description: Toboe reflects on the journey with the pack and the time leading up to their fateful encounters.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 15 - Grey Wolf
articles.description: Tsume reflects on his past and moments when he joined Kiba, Toboe, and Hige.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 11 - Vanishing Point
articles.description: The night of the full moon is here. The pack is trembling with energy and excitement. Elsewhere, Darcia prepares to come for Cheza with Cher in his captivity. So much danger coming and yet the moon rises. Will it be Cheza’s doom or the key to paradise?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 9 - Misgivings
articles.description: The pack investigates the town for a way out, but it is swarmed with those looking for them. As they search, Cheza encounters Blue and tells her she has wolf in her. Though true to her master, Blue takes off when she is attacked by a guard.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 8 - Song of Sleep
articles.description: A sweet song followed by sweet dreams. The pack has a proper sleep since their journey began. But when the day starts again, they must find a way to get back on their trek and protect Cheza. But who is that strange figure following them?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 6 - The Successors
articles.description: With Kiba injured, the pack cannot move on. While on the hunt for food, Hige is caught in a trap and taken away. Can the rest of the pack get to him in time, or will Zali’s pack keep them from rescuing their friend?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 5 - Fallen Wolves
articles.description: After traveling for days on end, Kiba picks up the faint scent of Lunar Flowers. Where it leads them is not a Paradise, but just another broken city filled with wolves who have given up on Paradise. What cruel reality awaits them in this forsaken town?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain OVA - Episode 30 - Wolf's Rain
articles.description: To end the journey and to open Paradise, sacrifices must be made and loss must be felt. The door will be opened, but who will be there? Which Paradise will become the new world?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain OVA - Episode 29 - High Tide, High Time
articles.description: The trek to Paradise has cost so much. The pack loses one of its own and cry into the darkened sky. But they cannot stop, they must keep moving towards Paradise. But a chilling revelation is made—they can’t all make it there.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 15 - Fly Forth! To Towasanga!
articles.description: The Megafauna charts a course for Towasanga on the far side of the moon. Raraiya tells the others of the current state of affairs in her homeland. Meanwhile, Klim and Mask advance on the moon with their respective ships as well but Mashner of the Dorette Flee…

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 2 - Dancing Flowers
articles.description: With Kaneki having left Anteiku, Touka begins studying for college to distract her from everything that is happening. Meanwhile, having incurred so many casualties while fighting Aogiri, CCG gears up to completely wipe out Aogiri Tree, as well as the Owl.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 10 - Keystone
articles.description: Fushimi is welcomed into JUNGLE as its newest J-Rank Clansman. Meanwhile, the prime minister strips Munakata of his authority and position as captain of SCEPTER 4.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 8 - Kaput
articles.description: Tenkei Iwafune is revealed to be the Gray King, who was thought to have died years ago during the Kagutsu Incident. Once a man of great virtue and compassion, Iwafune has since abandoned his own ideals to serve the Green King instead.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 5 - Ken
articles.description: The Red, Blue and Silver Clans agree to form an alliance to stand against the Green Clan. Things seem to go smoothly as the three clans work together to clear the streets of the Greens. However, Shiro and Anna grow concerned over Munakata's health as he begin…

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 3 - Kismet
articles.description: Green King Nagare Hisui orders his two most powerful clansmen, Yukari Mishakuji and Sukuna Gojo, to attack the School Island where Kuro and Neko have set up base. While Yukari goes after Kuro, Sukuna decides to have a little fun by taking on both Misaki Yata …

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 7 - Liz, for the First Time
articles.description: Braz leaves Liz under the care of Staz and returns to Demon World Acropolis alone, having obtained the sample of Fuyumi's magic required to resurrect her back into a human. Liz is homesick at first, but after spending some time with Staz and Fuyumi, she begin…

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 3 - You Had It All Along
articles.description: Staz and Fuyumi head out to West Demon World in search of the Book of Human Resurrection, where they are greeted by Wolf, the territory boss in charge of that area and a longtime rival of Staz.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 25 - False Memories
articles.description: Hige’s past comes to light, and it’s not pretty. Tsume is locked up with Hubb and the old wolf woman, and Toboe soon joins them. It’s up to Kiba to find Cheza—but will he be walking straight into Jaguara’s trap?

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 11 - I'm Not a Cat
articles.description: As Staz and Fuyumi are in their journey, Fuyumi has to consume Staz's blood once again to avoid disappearing and starts to become addicted to it...

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 5 - Unidentified Demon Object
articles.description: While being incarcerated in Liz's Toy Box, Staz receives a visit from his brother Braz, who offers him a deal: in exchange for giving him the knowledge of human resurrection, Staz must destroy a monster that is rampaging across the Demon World.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 24 - Scent of a Trap
articles.description: Danger lingers in the air of Jaguara’s keep and everyone is on their guard. Something is off with this city and people. Toboe searches for Hige who struggles with mixed memories—has he been here before? Blue learns the truth about her and Quent’s home.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 22 - Pieces of a Shooting Star
articles.description: Cher and Blue set off to find Cheza and Hubb while the pack heads in the same direction. The journey to Jaguara’s keep is harsh and hazardous as they travel across frozen waters. But something much more dangerous awaits them under the ice…

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 17 - Scent of a Flower, Blood of a Wolf
articles.description: Hige reflects on the journey with the pack and the time leading up to their fateful encounters.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 12 - Don't make me blue
articles.description: Darcia has Cheza once again, and the pack is left beaten under the full moon. But not everything goes Darcia’s way when he returns to his castle. The pack takes time to heal, unaware of the storm brewing on the horizon, and encounters a familiar face.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 3 - Bad Fellow
articles.description: Cheza is taken without any trail to follow. Kiba and Hige decide to take their search outside of town but run into Toboe, saving him from a troublesome situation. Toboe joins up with them on the journey to Paradise and implores Tsume to come with them.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 2 - Toboe, Who Doesn’t Howl
articles.description: Paradise is out there, and the Flower Maiden is the key. To get her, Kiba and Hige must find a way back into the facility they just escaped. But will they get to her first? Elsewhere, young Toboe tries to fit in with humans but can’t help his wolf nature.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 1 - City of Howls
articles.description: The world is in shambles, unfit for living. Is there a paradise out there—an escape from the cold shell the world has become? The wolves begin to gather as the Flower Maiden awakens, and the journey for paradise soon begins.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 7 - The Mask Corp's Fierce Assault
articles.description: Bellri's mother, Wilmit Zenam, descends to Earth alone in an atmospheric entry glider planning to search for Bellri. Klim, who has taken an interest in Raraiya, gets her to launch in the G-Self. As she does, Mask of the Capital Army launches an attack with hi…

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 8 - Old Nines
articles.description: During Kaneki's visit with Yoshimura, he asks for information about the Owl, and is told the tragic tale of a young ghoul named Kuzen. Touka makes plans to move out of Anteiku. A snowy day brings with it brisk business at the coffee shop.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 5 - Rift
articles.description: After living together at a CCG children's home years earlier, Kurona, Nashiro, and Suzuya are reunited in combat at Cochlea. Ayato faces an uphill battle against Shinohara, who is equipped with armor created from the remnants of his own father, Arata.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 11 - Kali-Yuga
articles.description: JUNGLE releases the Dresden Slates’ true power to evolve mankind. As chaos spreads across the world, Munakata and Zenjo head to the site where they believe the Green Clan is hiding.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 9 - Kid's Room
articles.description: Kusanagi and Awashima infiltrate a party hosted by JUNGLE to get the list of attendees who are tied to the Green Clan. However, their attempt is thwarted by an unexpected figure.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 1 - Knave
articles.description: A year has passed since the School Island incident, where four of the seven kings fought for their lives to stop the evil Colorless King. Since then, Silver King Yashiro Isana has gone missing and the Green Clan JUNGLE has become more active in spreading thei…

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 4 - To Demon World Acropolis
articles.description: A reluctant Staz visits Demon World Acropolis to seek his older brother, Braz D. Blood, the author of the Book of Human Resurrection and the only one who can decipher it. Meanwhile, Wolf and Mamejiro are shocked to find out that Fuyumi is starting to disappea…

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 21 - Battle's Red Glare
articles.description: War rages on between the Nobles’ troops. The pack stumbles upon a battle in a small town and takes out Jaguara’s forces. They learn that Cheza may be in Jaguara’s keep and go there. Then, things turn chaotic as Hubb and Cher attempt to rescue Cheza.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain OVA - Episode 27 - Where the Soul Goes
articles.description: Jaguara’s city has fallen, and chaos runs rampant. The pack is wounded and Cheza is withering, but Paradise is still out there. The group comes together, and the journey to the end begins.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 26 - Rising on Earth
articles.description: Bellri races across the battlefield in an attempt to stop the fighting but finds himself pushed into a corner by the fierce attacks of powerful opponents. Meanwhile, Klim and Mick fight a heated battle against Jugan in his Langebein and the Wuxia Team under h…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 12 - Capital Tower Occupied
articles.description: The Amerian space fleet, having risen into space, now advances on Sankt Porto. Mask sorties to halt their advance, entering combat with Klim Nick's blue Jahannam. Bellri, aboard the G-Self, equipped with the Assault Pack, attempts to intercede and stop the fi…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 6 - Dellensen, a Fearsome Foe!
articles.description: With a sense of responsibility as a Capital Guard cadet, Bellri spies on the Amerian space fleet in geocentric orbit. Meanwhile, Dellensen shows up for a return match to rescue Bellri and friends, but he goes into battle with the G-Self not knowing that it is…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 5 - The Enemy is the Capital Army
articles.description: Klim pressures Bellri, who has learned that the Megafauna is an Amerian Army ship, to enlist. As he does, the Megafauna, which had lifted off to engage in diversionary maneuvers, is attacked by a unit of the new Elf Bullock mobile suits led by Mask. Bellri fl…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 3 - The Pressure of Montero
articles.description: Klim Nick of the Pirate Corps begins an operation to rescue Aida, attacking the Capital Territory in his Montero. Aida plans her own return in the G-Self with Bellri and his friends getting dragged along.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 10 - Last Rain
articles.description: The battle between CCG and Anteiku continues, and Koma, Irimi, and Yoshimura each age the special investigators. When a civilian gets caught in the middle, Hachikawa continues to press his attack unabated. Shinohara receives some unexpected advice.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 9 - City In Waiting
articles.description: Yoshitoki is granted permission to execute the operation to eradicate the Owl. The many CCG officers involved in the mission take time beforehand to write any last words they might have, as the 20th Ward is cordoned off and its civilians evacuated.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 20 - CONSCIOUSLY
articles.description: The pack begins to travel to the Desert of Bones in hopes of finding Kiba, but Toboe decides he’d rather stay with Iyek’s tribe. When soldiers attack, Tsume and Hige stumble upon Kiba who is paralyzed with his spirit trapped in a paradise illusion.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 18 - Men, Wolves, and the Book of the Moon
articles.description: Hubb reflects on the journey he’s taken with Quent to find Cher and what inexplicable things he’s learned along the way.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 14 - The Fallen Keep
articles.description: The snow falls harshly around them, the cold taking its toll. Kiba wants to forge ahead—unable to see anything other than Cheza waiting for him—and leaves the pack behind as they rest. What danger lurks in the deteriorating castle?

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 22 - Reunions in the Earth Sphere
articles.description: Pursuing the G-IT Corps as they head to Earth in the Full Moon Ship, the Megafauna returns to the Earth Sphere to find the Capital, Amerian and Dorette armies embroiled in a three-way war. On that battlefield, many reunions await.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 24 - Space Kaleidoscope
articles.description: Aida's father, the Inspector General of the Amerian Army announces to Klim that he will defeat the Capital Army in a joint operation with the Dorette Fleet. However, a kaleidoscope of death flashes through space as Barara's large-scale Mobile Armor, the Yggdr…

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 3 - Hangman
articles.description: A CCG prison bus is attacked by Aogiri Tree members. At Anteiku, Touka and Hinami find out that Kaneki is involved in the attack, but each react to the news in different ways, prompting Hinami to try to be less of an imposition upon Touka.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 13 - Kings
articles.description: Shiro and Neko finally make it to the level where Hisui awaits them. Determined to free the world from the Slates’ influence, Shiro activates his final plan to destroy the Dresden Slates once and for all.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 12 - Knuckle Bump
articles.description: Fushimi risks his life to clear the path for the Red and Silver Clans to enter the Green Clan’s secret base. Realizing that Fushimi was on their side all along, Yata races to save his former friend.

articles.title: K - Return of Kings - Episode 7 - Kickdown
articles.description: Green King Hisui Nagare enters battle. Unleashing his tremendous power, Hisui quickly makes his way up towards Mihashira Tower, where the other three kings stand by ready to face him.

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 9 - Sins of the Eye Glasses
articles.description: The Acropolis Police bring in Braz for questioning before Wolf-Daddy, the king of Demon World Acropolis. Meanwhile, Fuyumi is brought to the subspace world Hydra and is greeted by an unexpected person.

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 1 - She's a Skeleton Now
articles.description: Staz Charlie Blood is a powerful vampire with a huge love for Japanese anime and games. When a young schoolgirl named Fuyumi wanders into his territory, Staz cannot hide his excitement at meeting a living human from his favorite culture. But his joy is cut sh…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 25 - Crossing the Line of Death
articles.description: Bellri sorties in the Perfect Backpack equipped G-Self. Mask in the Kabakali and Manny in the G-Rach stand in his way. This battlefield where new models from Venus Globe dance wildly is pulled into the hellish heat of atmospheric entry by gravity.

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 16 - Beliri's War
articles.description: Having reached Raraiya's homeland and learned the secret of his own birth, Bellri hears that Mask's Space Garanden has appeared and he takes it upon himself to launch in the G-Self without anyone's permission. While piloting the G-Self, he is attacked by a Mo…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 13 - Those Who Came From the Moon
articles.description: An Amerian supply ship has been sunk by a mysterious fleet that came from the moon. Klim and Mask, bound by a sense of unity as Earthnoids, embark on an operation where they will pretend to surrender and then seize the enemy flagship. Bellri, aboard the G-Sel…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 11 - Charge in! The Space War
articles.description: The threat from space has greatly motivated the Amerian Army and Capital Guard on Earth to act. Each faction raises its forces into orbit one after another. Mask and his unit launches from the Space Garanden and attacks the Megafauna in an attempt to seize Be…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 8 - Mother, Father and Mask
articles.description:
The Inspector General of the Amerian Army, Aida's father Gusion, comes to resupply the Megafauna. Bellri goes out to battle equipped with a new piece of equipment, the Tricky Pack.
Meanwhile, Aida, having detected an unidentified craft coming from the direct…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 4 - Wild Dance of the Catsith
articles.description: With the excuse that they are rescuing the captive Bellri, the Capital Army sends out Captain Dellensen with a unit of Catsiths. In response to this intense assault, the Megafauna sends out Klim in his Montero and a unit of Grimoires to intercept. With Noredo…

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 4 - Deeper Layers
articles.description: Amon and Akira visit Cochlea in order to get information about the Owl from Amon's former foster father, Donato Porpora. However, while they are there, the facility comes under attack by a large number of Aogiri Tree ghouls, led by Kaneki and Ayato!

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 6 - That's Friendship
articles.description: Staz arrives in North Demon World where Wolf is engaged in a fierce battle with the Artificial Demon Akim Papradon. Taking over the fight for his weakened friend, Staz decides to make use of his restored magic power to deliver the forbidden super-finishing mo…

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 2 - Back Home, But Not Really
articles.description: Staz's dream of visiting Japan finally comes true when he escorts Fuyumi back to the human world. But Fuyumi, now a ghost, is not too thrilled with Staz disrupting her once peaceful human life. To make matters worse, Fuyumi's prolonged stay in the human world…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 23 - Sound of a New Type
articles.description: Mask attempts to make contact with the Full Moon Ship. While the Becker Team arrives to reinforce him. The Amerian and Dorette fleets which both move to prevent this are locked in a fleet battle. Bellri, who is caught up in the fighting, has a showdown with R…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 10 - Escape from the Territory
articles.description: Bellri and Aida, having left their parents during the audience with the pope, try to help the Megafauna escape from the Capital Territory. However, before they can, their path is blocked by Becker and his new mobile suit model, the Wuxia.Using the G-Self newl…

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 2 - G-Self, Start Up!
articles.description: To search for Aida, who was taken prisoner, Captain Cahill of the Pirate Corps invades the Capital Territory in his Grimoire. Bellri, who had been ordered to move the G-Self rushes to the port hangar, but...

articles.title: Gundam - Reconguista in G - Episode 1 - The Mysterious Mobile Suit
articles.description: Bellri Zenam is a cadet in the Capital Guard, which protects the Capital Tower. During his first drill in space, a mysterious Mobile Suit (G-Self) suddenly attacks. He uses a work-model mobile suit (Recten) to fight it.

articles.title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A - Episode 6 - Thousand Paths
articles.description: Suzuya's hellish boyhood is revisited, and it is revealed how he came to work for CCG. As Touka studies for her entrance exams, Roma, a new waitress, fills in for her at Anteiku. Tempers erupt when Akira joins Amon and Seido for supper.

articles.title: Blood Lad - Episode 10 - The Dark Hero Rises
articles.description: A man tied to Fuyumi's past tells Staz about the events that took place at the Yanagi residence 14 years ago. The man then asks how Staz really feels about Fuyumi and what he wants to do with her once she is brought back to life.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 23 - Heartbeat of the Black City
articles.description: The pack splits up and searches for a way into Jaguara’s keep. Hige seems to have a keen sense of where to go and what’s around the area. But is there more to it than just a sense?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 19 - A Dream of an Oasis
articles.description: The pack can’t find Kiba and struggle to decide whether to stop the journey completely—until they run into a tribe that believes in and protects wolves. Elsewhere, Kiba wakes up in a beautiful oasis and meets a strange girl. Is this Paradise?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 13 - Men's Lament
articles.description: With Blue joining them, the pack heads to Darcia’s castle in hopes of getting Cheza back. Not far behind them, Hubb and Quent make their way to the town, seeking out Cher.

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 10 - Moon's Doom
articles.description: The pack takes their trek through the Forest of Death, a place feared by the humans. As they wander hungry and tired, Hige and Tsume go after a mysterious owl. But will this talking avian lead them out or lead them astray?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 7 - The Flower Maiden
articles.description: The door to Paradise leads the pack to a forest. As they wander, the sky lights up with an airship battle. Something leads Kiba in their direction—the same thing that’s been pulling him on this journey: his instinct. Has it finally led him to Cheza?

articles.title: Wolf's Rain - Episode 4 - Scars in the Wasteland
articles.description: The new pack travels across the harsh terrain, their destination still undetermined. Tempers flare, and Tsume wanders away from the pack. Toboe goes to find him, but the land they’ve stumbled upon presents more danger than they ever thought possible.

articles.author: Patty Catalano
articles.title: Meal Prep Plan: How I Prep a Week of Meals from Aldi for Just $50
articles.description:
Here's how to spend $50 at Aldi and eat for a week.
READ MORE...

articles.author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
articles.title: Digimon's Digifest 2020 Is Going Digital on August 1 With Virtual Convention
articles.description: The Toei Animation YouTube channel will host the composer and voice actors from the Digimon Adventure franchise The annual Digifest, a Digimon Festival, will be moving into the digital space this year with Digifest 2020 Online, an online convention being host…
